mdRecord.dcterms:title: Hemacytometer kit
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Spencer Lens Company [manufacturer]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Contained in cardboard box; includes: sealed Spencer Bright-Line Hemacytometer, instructions, 2 hemacytometer cover glasses, box of cover glass microscope slides, 12 glass bottles with droppers, small latex hose as a dispenser; hemacytometer by the Spencer Lens Company, Buffalo 11, New York; Cover glass by the Propper Manufacturing Company, Hellig, Inc., and C.A Hausser& Son. [original]
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Medical laboratory technology
Hemocytometers
